giftIdeas.name: Photography Workshop Gift Certificate
giftIdeas.rationale: Perfect for their growing interest in photography. Local workshop offers weekend classes for beginners to intermediate level.
giftIdeas.timeline: Order 2 weeks before - digital certificate or physical card
giftIdeas.personalization: Can add personal note about specific class type they mentioned wanting to learn
giftIdeas.backupPlan: Online photography course subscription (Skillshare, MasterClass) if local options full

giftIdeas.name: Premium Coffee Subscription (3 months)
giftIdeas.rationale: They're a coffee enthusiast and love trying new roasts. Delivers unique beans monthly.
giftIdeas.timeline: Order 1-2 weeks before to ensure first shipment arrives on time
giftIdeas.personalization: Choose subscription that focuses on their preferred roast level (light/medium/dark)
giftIdeas.backupPlan: High-quality coffee maker accessory (pour-over set, grinder)

giftIdeas.name: Custom Photo Book of Hiking Adventures
giftIdeas.rationale: Compile photos from hikes you've done together or their favorite trails. Sentimental and unique.
giftIdeas.timeline: Start 3-4 weeks before - needs time to design and ship
giftIdeas.personalization: Add captions with dates, trail names, funny memories from each hike
giftIdeas.backupPlan: Framed photo from a memorable hike

giftIdeas.name: Hiking Trail Guide Book + Maps
giftIdeas.rationale: Comprehensive guide to local trails they haven't explored yet. Practical for planning future adventures.
giftIdeas.personalization: Include a handwritten note suggesting which trails to try first or offering to join them

giftIdeas.name: Portable Espresso Maker for Camping
giftIdeas.rationale: Combines their love of coffee and hiking. Allows quality coffee on the trail.
giftIdeas.personalization: Include sample packet of their favorite coffee to try with it
giftIdeas.backupPlan: Insulated travel mug for hot coffee on trails
